title: (x) which typeface is this? - Handel Gothic customized {Stephen}
content:
Just curious as to what typeface the "Audioslave" logo/name is thanks!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Audioslave.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018022442/http:/typophile.com/files/Audioslave.jpg) | 586.07 KB |
author: seansurfn2

comments.content: It probably was saved in cymk

And the designer _might_ be [Peter Curzon](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018022442/http:/www.petercurzon.com/index.php?option=com_content&task=view&id=28&Itemid=35), although I am only certain that he was responsible for the [flame symbol](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018022442/http:/static.zoovy.com/img/rockmusicjewelry/W150-H150-Bf0f0f0/zp0243.jpg).
